SELECT A.PROJECT_ID ,A.PROJECT_TITLE ,A.PROJECT_CREATE_DT ,A.PROJECT_END_DT ,A.PROJECT_UPDATE_DT ,A.PROJECT_ST ,A.EMP_ID ,A.EMP_NAME ,A.DUTY_Count ,NVL(B.openIssueCount,0) as openIssueCount ,NVL(C.closedIssueCount,0) as closedIssueCount FROM PROJECT A ,(SELECT a.PROJECT_ID, count(*) as openIssueCount FROM DUTY a, ISSUE_BOARD b WHERE b.ISSUE_OPEN_ST = 1 and a.DUTY_BOARD_ID = b.DUTY_BOARD_ID GROUP BY a.PROJECT_ID ORDER BY a.PROJECT_ID) B ,(SELECT a.PROJECT_ID, count(*) as closedIssueCount FROM DUTY a, ISSUE_BOARD b WHERE b.ISSUE_OPEN_ST = 2 and a.DUTY_BOARD_ID = b.DUTY_BOARD_ID GROUP BY a.PROJECT_ID ORDER BY a.PROJECT_ID) C WHERE 1=1
AND PROJECT_ST=1
AND PROJECT_ST=2
AND A.PROJECT_ID = B.PROJECT_ID(+) AND A.PROJECT_ID = C.PROJECT_ID(+) ORDER BY PROJECT_UPDATE_DT DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PROJECT ( PROJECT_ID ,PROJECT_TITLE ,PROJECT_CREATE_DT ,PROJECT_END_DT ,PROJECT_UPDATE_DT ,PROJECT_ST ,EMP_ID ,EMP_NAME ,DUTY_Count ) VALUES ( PROJECT_ID_SEQ.nextval ,#{project_Title} ,sysdate ,#{project_End_Dt} ,sysdate ,1 ,#{emp_Id} ,#{emp_Name} ,0 )
